root.name: Dungeonbowl
root.description: OverviewDungeonbowl is a fantasy themed football game developed and published by Cyanide Studio for the PC platform.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor: Pentium 4 2.4Ghz / Athlon 2400+Memory: 2GBGraphics: 256 MB, DirectX 9 and Shaders Models 2 compatibleHard Drive: 2GB
